data.title: Awesome party time!
data.text: We had a birthday party for my wife here today, it was amazing!  The staff was excellent, helpful and very friendly.  Becky was our party host and she was perfect.  Available and helpful when needed, but never intrusive.  Everyone had a great time.  I would recommend Crackpots highly.

data.title: Great for kids
data.text: We went there several times to have our kids decorate their own breakfast and soup bowls over the last 5 years, which are still in daily use up to today.

data.title: fun for everyone
data.text: I have taken my children here many times for parties. They absolutely love it. However for the first time I went with a bunch of friends for a girls night. It was so much fun. Would defiantly go back again.

data.title: Fun Class with Amazing Results
data.text: Took a glass fusing class with some friends.  The people in attendance were very nice and the employees very supportive and helpful.  The projects all turned out shockingly good!

data.title: Artistic retreat
data.text:
Crackpots is the perfect place for friends to gather, be creative and have fun! So many fun projects to choose from!
The staff is incredible,always friendly and willing to help.

data.title: Nice paint your own pottery place
data.text: This is just like many paint your own pottery places. You pick out your piece, paint it, and they will put it in the kiln for you. They have other choices too such as glass fusing. The facility is big and bright. They carry some drinks if you get thirsty. There are several choices closeby for treats and drinks. Very kid friendly.

data.title: Knitting Group Fun
data.text: Went here this evening with 6 women from my knitting group and several of us has our children along. We painted bowls to hold our yarn for knitting, mugs, bowls, vase. Everyone had their own flare and the color options are fantastic. We can pick up our projects on Sat after 3pm so not even a week turn around. I had a 2 for 1 coupon for the session which helped and I set a limit for my children to not pick anything over $14 to paint. Can not wait to get them fired and see how they turn out. They offer mosaics as well and have all the tools. We will be back!

data.title: Great for families
data.text: Crackpots is so much fun! They have a vast selection of pieces for painting, different types of paint, silk-screening and all the tools you need for your masterpiece. It's a wonderful outing for kids and bonus-- Tuesdays are two for one painting fee!

data.title: With kids or solo
data.text: This is absolutely a kid friendly place, although you can also come on your own.  They are very friendly and have a large stock of objects on which to paint, and then they do fire them for you. So come if you want to be by yourself and indulge your creative fantasies or bring the kids and have fun that way.

data.title: Tamar, the owner, is  warm, inviting and  sincerely interested in helping you be creative in her studio.
data.text: Crackpots is a wonderful place for kids and adults of all ages to come in from the elements of Colorado weather and turn on those creative juices! Great place to make a Colorado keepsake for your travel memories! Lots of to-be-painted pieces to choose from, many of which have practical uses in your home.

data.title: A fun time with the grandkids!
data.text: We had a great time picking out our pottery pieces, painting them and waiting for our treasures to be fired so we could pick them up.  The ladies who run this establishment are fun, patient and welcoming.  It's a bit pricey, so we keep it for special occasions, but the granddaughter asks if this is what we can do each time she comes to visit.  I know we'll be going back.

data.title: Good Time Art
data.text: A group of friends and I met here to paint bowls for a local charity. They allow you to bring your own drinks and snacks to make a night of painting. There were many supplies and options for painting. We  had a great time and everyones' bowls turned out original and creative.The staff was very helpful.

data.title: Great experience
data.text: My son (4) loves this place. So much so, we have a punch card. I painted my first piece recently. The selection is large and there are a lot of clearly labeled paints. The staff is extremely helpful.

data.title: Great experience each time
data.text: The crackpots team is amazing, our daughters are in nearly monthly because of storytime and clays dates. We are always happy with our visits!

data.title: So much fun!
data.text: Once a year when my son doesn't have school, we visit Crackpots and paint our own pottery.  This is such a great experience!  You can spend as much time as you like painting a piece that you pick out.  It only takes a few days for them to finish your piece and have it ready to pick up.

data.title: A Blast!
data.text: I loved it and I am no artist.  I painted a couple of bowls, a couple smaller finger bowls a a cat tray container.  Crackpots glazed and fired everything for me so I am actually able to use the things I made.  They are not glorious works of art, but they are not bad either.  Crackpots has absolutely everything imaginable you could need to create your ceramic masterpiece!  Try it.  It will definitely bring out the kid in you.
